```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

``` {r install_packages}
library(openxlsx)
```

```{r joining}

# Read CSV files
data1 <- read.xlsx("data/QMB3250_1_2014-01-13_2014-01-19.xlsx")
data2 <- read.xlsx("data/QMB3250_1_2014-01-20_2014-01-26.xlsx")

# Merge data
total <- merge(data1, data2, by=c("USER_NAME","UFID", "Section_No"), suffixes = c(".Week1",".Week2"))

# Write joined data
write.xlsx(total, file="output/output.xlsx", sheetName="Joined forms")

```
